reviews.review_msg: Passionate about teaching, Kate does not give grades away.   An A means outstanding work, not average work.  Get on board, this is a major university and not all students are "A" students.
take this course with him. my advice is to not read the text and ONLY read the lecture notes and what he talks about in class.
Best prof ever! very clear and always repeating himself to ensure everybody's got it. exams are not hard as long as you go to class & study the notes and the practice questions in tutorials!
Great being in his class.  Very clear and helpful.  Really nice to have a teacher who seems like they care about the students
Nice guy, did okay for his first time teaching.  Will be an excellent prof with some experience.  He really cared about his students and wasn't out to surprise anyone.
